parallel.distributed

Class DLockSrv

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.DLockSrv

  • public class DLockSrv
extends java.lang.Object
    class implements a server for distributed locking functionality. Multiple JVMs can connect to this server and ask for the lock corresponding to this server. Each client may as well be multi-threaded.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
